privacy_policy_text: By registering, you agree to our privacy policy.
privacy_policy_modal_text:
By registering, you agree that we collect and process your personal data, such as your name, email address, and other necessary information to create your account. This data is used solely for managing your account and providing our services.

We are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Your data will never be shared with third parties without your consent, unless required by law.

You have the right to access your data, rectify it, delete it, or object to its processing, in accordance with the applicable regulations. For more information, please contact us at contact@soteria.fr.

For more details, consult our
